suggest.patch on drupal/migrate_spreadsheet #1: Add https://www.drupal.org/files/issues/2019-12-06/3032719-no-error-on-null.patch patch on migrate_spreadsheet and use the skip_on_empty process to prevent additional lines to be processed
suggest.patch on drupal/migrate_spreadsheet #2: Add https://www.drupal.org/files/issues/2021-06-21/3219880-trim-error.patch patch on migrate_spreadsheet to prevent issues with empty header cells generated by Google Calc
suggest.patch on drupal/core #1: Add https://www.drupal.org/files/issues/2021-05-07/core-fix_config_entity_migrate_destination_update_entity-3118262-23--complete.patch patch on drupal/core to be able to use the migrations to update configuration entities
suggest.patch on drupal/core #2: Add https://www.drupal.org/files/issues/2021-09-27/2845340-53.patch on drupal/core to prevent migration map table names to be truncated
